description: Have always enjoyed working with JS and its various frameworks/libraries. Currently messing around with React.
Personal interest in Python over the last year has had be investing a lot of time learning it. Using it a lot more in current courses.
Have been working with HTML & CSS since well before High School. Something I am very comfortable with.
Have worked with Photoshop since before high school. Pretty experienced with designing, slicing, and coding layouts.
The frontend of my portfolio. A nice complement to node. Continuing to learn Angular with small projects here and there.
Current side-interest. Could use some more practice.
Virtually all of my coursework done in Java, really enjoying it.
